meanings.definition: A small, golden sponge cake with a creamy filling.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat twinkies for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on twinkies, so I bought a box.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone fought over the last twinkie.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet and delightful as a twinkie.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked twinkies filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: To act in a foolish or silly manner.
meanings.sent1: He twinkies around when he's trying to make people laugh.
meanings.sent2: Don't twinkies during an important meeting.
meanings.sent3: She twinkies around the house pretending to be a superhero.
meanings.sent4: His decision to quit his job and travel the world was a real twinkies move.
meanings.sent5: The children twinkies happily in the playground.
